com.moosemorals.mediabrowser

Class DownloadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moosemorals.mediabrowser.DownloadManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, ListModel<PVR.PVRFile>

     class DownloadManager
extends Object
implements ListModel<PVR.PVRFile>, Runnable
    Keep track of files that need downloading and their status, and then download them.
    Author:
    Osric Wilkinson (osric@fluffypeople.com)

      • moveFiles

        void moveFiles(int row,
             List<PVR.PVRFile> files)
        Move an (already queued) list of files to (before) the specified row.
        Parameters:
        row - int target row. Files will be inserted before this row.
        files - List<PVRFile> of files already in the list to move.

      • insert

        void insert(int row,
          List<PVR.PVRFile> files)
        Queue a list of files not already queued.
        Parameters:
        row - int target row. Files will be inserted before this row.
        files - List<PVRFile> of files to be inserted
